Add or remove the New External Orders icon

1 Navigate to the following directory using the Windows Explorer:

C:\Picis\Config\ChartPlus\RealTime

2 Double-click the real-time pcs file for the template you want to edit. (For example, the template for the default general anesthesia template is called ga_rt.pcs.)

The Picis Configuration Editor will open.

3 Under [Application], set the ShowGoToPOESAlert parameter to TRUE to show the icon, or to FALSE to hide it.

4 On the File menu, click Exit.
